Services

01

Spatial Planning

We analyze your space to optimize flow and functionality, creating layouts that perfectly balance aesthetics and utility.

02

Bespoke Interiors

Every detail is curated for you. From custom furniture to lighting, we design unique elements that define your personal style.

03

Turnkey Execution

A seamless journey from concept to reality. We manage contractors, sourcing, and installation, ensuring flawless delivery.

Expertise

From cozy apartments to sprawling villas, we design homes that reflect your personality and lifestyle, ensuring comfort and elegance in every corner.

We create productive and inspiring work environments, retail spaces, and hospitality interiors that align with your brand identity and business goals.

Transforming existing spaces into modern masterpieces. We breathe new life into old structures while preserving their unique charm.

Bespoke furniture pieces designed specifically for your space, ensuring perfect fit, functionality, and a unique aesthetic appeal.

End-to-end project management from design to handover. We handle all contractors and vendors, giving you a stress-free experience.

About

Abhinav Reddy Gotham is a premier interior designer based in Hyderabad, India. With a passion for creating personalized and aesthetic living spaces, Trishakthi by ARG transforms your vision into reality. We believe in designs that are not just visually stunning but also deeply resonant with the people who inhabit them. Specializing in modern, traditional, and fusion designs that reflect your lifestyle.
